ComicInfo.Summary:
Luse and Jace enter the town of Pike and find out they have a werewolf problem. They search out the mayor to try to get the werewolf slaying job but find out they hired a werewolf hunter by the name of Winston. After besting her they are given contract to kill the wolf but there's one catch they have only four nights to do it.
